bibl.title: Triumphal Arches in Nubian Sacral Architecture.
bibl.note: Main characteristics and chronology of Nubian churches with triumphal arches. - Forms of the Nubian triumphal arches. - Decoration of Nubian triumphal arches. - Functional and symbolic significance of Nubian triumphal arches. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.seg: Bartosz Wojciechowski, Triumphal Arches in Nubian Sacral Architecture.

Main characteristics and chronology of Nubian churches with triumphal arches. - Forms of the Nubian triumphal arches. - Decoration of Nubian triumphal arches. - Functional and symbolic significance of Nubian triumphal arches. - Conclusion.
